page.title: 09SERVICES IN BUNGAY
page.content: The fire station was built in 1930.There are 11 part-time firemen,who are called out by a belt-held radio about once every 3 days. The ambulance station was built in 1935.There are 35 ambulancemen and one woman who work on a part-time basis.They train twice a year.Calls average at one a week. There is a police station in Bungay with a regular force.There is a schools liason officer. Meals on Wheels is voluntary work,18 people take turns to deliver hot meals to old and invalid people.
